treatment-md.title: Metapseudinae Heard, Stępień, Drumm, Błażewicz & Anderson, 2018, n. gen.
treatment-md.article-title: Systematic and taxonomic observations on the subfamily Synapseudinae Guţu, 1972 and related metapseudid taxa (Crustacea: Tanaidacea: Apseudomorpha), with the erection of a new genus and descriptions of three new species
